column5: Jack has caught the fishing bug this year. Loving spending time in the boat with him. He is a pretty good angler and watches and learns really quick.
Really enjoyed that one Awesome that your son wants to head out with ya Cheers Andrew
Cool, looks like he's having a blast fishing with you! Great stuff!
Wow! I am so envious......Jack's fish catching abilities, Jack's hair (amazing!), and all those walleye right off the end of your dock! Great job Simon!
Man.. you certainly live in God's country..
Ya, he is joining me for a tournament next weekend called The Covid Classic, should be fun.
